alert.note: Alert for Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:28PM EDT until July 28 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CENTRE COUNTY... At 928 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pine Glen to Milesburg to Park Forest Village, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... State College, Bellefonte, Park Forest Village, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Lemont, Zion, Houserville, Milesburg, Snow Shoe, Clarence and Moshannon. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Kylertown and Lamar exits, specifically from mile markers 142 to 161. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 69 to 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
